job_history.work_description: Developed and Produced Weekly/Monthly/Quarterly Business Review Packages for Divisional Executive Team Lead and coordinate quarterly business reviews with various business partners Coordinate leadership team meetings by handling meeting logistics, preparing agendas, and compiling documents Coordinate Business Continuity Plans for the Region and coordinate with the 12 markets to ensure the plans were complete for the market Assist in the planning of department budget and space planning Organize and execute Divisional Leadership Offsite meetings.

Oversees an assigned portfolio of client credit relationships. Responsible for administrative aspects of payments, Capital Markets, Syndicated Loans, Treasury Management and Letters of Credit Products Proactively monitor portfolio, keeping Officers apprised of impending actions or events to ensure data integrity and effective mitigation of risk. Act as a liaison between Portfolio Management, clients and various areas of the bank Surfaces and resolves client-related issues Review legal documentation for pricing and administrative/operational requirement of the credit. Offers pre-closing guidance to ensure operation efficiency and bank compliance Maintain Electronic Credit Files and Compliance Tracking System to ensure operation efficiency and bank compliance. Monitors and assists in preparation and activities to comply with internal bank audit/control requirements.
Handled accounts of major clients in excess of $1MM or million. Process loan payments/advances and any needed research or maintenance to loans. Provide informative Cash Management Information.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in project management, including coordinating leadership team meetings, planning department budgets, and executing divisional leadership offsite meetings, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Developed and produced business review packages, which indicates a solid working proficiency in data analysis.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Coordinated leadership team meetings and executed divisional leadership offsite meetings, showing a solid level of proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Acted as a liaison between portfolio management, clients, and various areas of the bank, and coordinated with multiple stakeholders, indicating strong proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Proactively monitored portfolio and mitigated risk, showing a solid working proficiency in risk management.

skills.name: Compliance
skills.explanation: Maintained electronic credit files and compliance tracking systems, and ensured operation efficiency and bank compliance, indicating a solid working proficiency in compliance.

skills.name: Cash Management
skills.explanation: Provided cash management information to clients, showing some practical experience in cash management.

skills.name: Loan Administration
skills.explanation: Processed loan payments and advances, and performed research and maintenance on loans, indicating some practical experience in loan administration.
